answers.answer: I have not heard of narcotic drugs having this effect of clearing skin.If your skin is oily, white vinegar is effective as an astringent.  Or try a tea tree oil soap.  Eat a healthy diet, high in vegetables, fruits, and lean, preferably organic meats, poultry and fish.Find out if you have food allergies and avoid problem foods.
Thew oxycontin has nothing whatsoever to do with the acne. That being said, get an hva1c. Diabetes can cause acne.

question: a year ago i was in the hospital and had surgery and everything.i was on oxy cottons the whole time in an awhile when i got out. while i was on them my skin was like baby smooth. i was starting to wean off of them an acne started popping out;i didnt think anything of it. then i hurt myself and took them a little bit more,my skin cleared right up;again,didnt think anything if it. .a year later today my back and shoulders and chest are covered wit what big bumps. . ? ive seen doctors and a derm.,but they all just say its really bad acne,but i know its something more. . .help please?
title: side effect from oxy cottons
